title: Palmerston, the Former ‘Chief Mouser’ for Britain’s Foreign Office, Dies
summary_full: The cat, who was named after a former prime minister, became a social media star. By the time of his death at about 12, he had more followers than many ambassadors have.
summary_public: The cat, who was named after a former prime minister, became a social media star. By the time of his death at about 12, he had more followers than many ambassadors have.
